##### FILE: deploy_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx_webserver:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx_webserver
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchlabels:
      app: nginx
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DATABASE_HOST
          value: db.example.com
        - name: API_Key
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: api-key
              name: my-secret
        image: nginx:latest
        name: nginx_webserver
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            memory: 200Mi

---

##### FILE: deploy_3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: web-app
  naame: nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: web-app
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: web-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 10
          readinessProbe:
            httpGet:
              path: /
              port: 80
            initialDelaySeconds: 5
            periodSeconds: 10
        name: nginx_container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 200Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 200Mi
      volumes:
      - name: data
        persistantVolumeClaim:
          claimName: my-pvc

---

Mutation has been applied successfully.

1 - autogen-validate-image-tag validation failure: validation error: Using a mutable image tag e.g. 'latest' is not allowed. rule autogen-validate-image-tag failed at path /image/

1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

##### FILE: deploy_4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/niginx-webserver:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx-server
  name: niginx-webserver
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchlables:
      app: nginx-server
  spec:
    affinity:
      nodeAffinity:
        requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          nodeSelectorTerms:
          - matchExpression:
            - key: node-type
              operator: In
              values:
              - nginx-node
      podAffinity:
        requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
        - labelSelector:
            matchExpression:
            - key: app
              operator: In
              values:
              - nginx
            topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
    containers:
    - image: nginx:latest
      name: nginx-container
      ports:
      - containerPort: 80
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/fastapi-server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: fastapi-server
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: fastapi-server
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: fastapi-server
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ACCESS_TOKEN_EXPIRE_MINUTES
          value: "30"
        - name: SECRET_KEY
          value: 09d25e094faa6ca2556c818166b7a9563b93f7099f6f0f4caa6cf63b88e8d3e7
        - name: DATABASE_CONNECTION_STRING
          value: sqlite:///./database.db
        image: daraniel/kubernetes-test-server:master
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: fastapi-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000

---

apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  name: fastapi-server
  namespace: default

  ports:
  - name: http
    nodePort: 30007
    port: 8000
    targetPort: 8000
  selector:
    app: fastapi-server
  type: LoadBalancer

##### FILE: deploy_and_serve_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Ingress/fastapi-server:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    cert-manager.io/cluster-issuer: letsencrypt-clusterissuer
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/rewrite-target: /$2
    nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io/use-regex: "true"
  name: fastapi-server
  namespace: default
spec:
  rules:
  - host: fastapi-host.com
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: fastapi-server
            port:
              number: 8000
        path: /(/|$)(.*)
        pathType: Prefix

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 1, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

##### FILE: deploy_and_serve_with_mysql_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/fastapi-server:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: fastapi-server
  name: fastapi-server
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: fastapi-server
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: fastapi-server
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ACCESS_TOKEN_EXPIRE_MINUTES
          value: "30"
        - name: SECRET_KEY
          value: 09d25e094faa6ca2556c818166b7a9563b93f7099f6f0f4caa6cf63b88e8d3e7
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: mysql-pass
        - name: DATABASE_CONNECTION_STRING
          value: mysql+mysqlconnector://fastapi_user:$(MYSQL_PASSWORD)@fastapi-mysql:3306/fastapi
        - name: PODNAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: LOG_PATH
          value: ./logs/$(PODNAME)
        - name: LOG_CFG
          value: ./configs/log_conf.yaml
        image: daraniel/kubernetes-test-server:master
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: fastapi-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: ./app/logs
          name: fastapi-server-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: fastapi-server-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: fastapi-server-claim

---


Mutation:

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    kubernetes.io/change-cause: image updated to 1.16.1
  name: my-deployment
  namespace: my-namespace
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: my-app
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 25%!
(MISSING)      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: my-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.16.1
        name: my-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

##### FILE: deploy_app.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ksv/Deployment/pod1-app:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: pod1-app
  namespace: ksv
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: pod1-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: pod1-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: yechae/kube-flask:v2
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: app-image
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /mnt
          name: volumes
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: volumes
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: pod1-pvc

---

##### FILE: deploy_app1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/web-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: web-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: web-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: web-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: AWS_DEFAULT_REGION
          value: ${AWS_DEFAULT_REGION}
        - name: AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID
          value: ${AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID}
        - name: AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY
          value: ${AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY}
        - name: S3_ENDPOINT_URL
          value: ${S3_ENDPOINT_URL}
        - name: S3_BUCKET
          value: ${S3_BUCKET}
        image: docker.io/ciaa/web:v0.8.0
        name: web-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 2000m
            memory: 2000Mi

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/back-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: url_shortner_back
  name: back-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: url_shortner_back
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: url_shortner_back
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_URI
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: mongo-uri
              name: mongo-uri
        image: mbhmma/url-shortly-back:1.0.6-bk
        name: back
        ports:
        - containerPort: 4000

---

  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-blue
      color: blue
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-blue
        color: blue
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: venugopal87/custom-nginx-blue
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

##### FILE: deploy_disk_lrs.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-lrs:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-lrs
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-lrs
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-lrs
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - while true; do echo $(date) >> /mnt/azuredisk/outfile; sleep 60; done
        image: nginx
        name: nginx
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /mnt/azuredisk
          name: azuredisk-lrs
      volumes:
      - name: azuredisk-lrs
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: azure-managed-disk-lrs

---

apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  labels:
    app: submission-id
  name: submission-id
  namespace: isolated-execution-env
spec:
  containers:
  - env:
    - name: CALLBACK_URL
      value: callback-url
    - name: SUBMISSION_ID
      value: submission-id
    - name: TESTCASES_GIT
      value: testcases-git
    - name: PROBLEM_ID
      value: problem-id
    image: language-image
    name: submission-id
    resources:
      limits:
        cpu: "0.5"
        memory: 256Mi
      requests:
        cpu: "0.25"
        memory: 128Mi
  restartPolicy: Never

---

##### FILE: deploy_group1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/timeserver1:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: timeserver1
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 5
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      pod: timeserver1-pod
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        pod: timeserver1-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: docker.io/wdenniss/timeserver:5
        name: timeserver-container
      nodeSelector:
        group: "1"
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: group
        operator: Equal
        value: "1"

---

##### FILE: deploy_headlamp.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to headlamp/Deployment/headlamp:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: headlamp
  namespace: headlamp
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: OIDC_CLIENT_ID
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: clientID
              name: oidc
        - name: OIDC_CLIENT_SECRET
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: clientSecret
              name: oidc
        - name: OIDC_ISSUER_URL
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: issuerURL
              name: oidc
        - name: OIDC_SCOPES
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: scopes
              name: oidc
        name: headlamp

---

##### FILE: deploy_high_priority.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/timeserver-hpp:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: timeserver-hpp
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      pod: timeserver-pod-hpp
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        pod: timeserver-pod-hpp
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: docker.io/wdenniss/timeserver:1
        name: timeserver-container
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 250Mi
      priorityClassName: high-priority-preemption

---

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/timeserver-hpp

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/apache:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: apache
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      run: apache
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        run: apache
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: registry.k8s.io/hpa-example
        name: apache
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
          requests:
            cpu: 200m

##### FILE: deploy_liveness.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/dp-liveness:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dp-liveness
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: python
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: python
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mario21ic/readiness-liveness:v1
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 2
          httpGet:
            path: /error
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 6
          periodSeconds: 1
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 2
        name: web
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: web
          protocol: TCP

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/deploy-mariadb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: app-page-data
  name: deploy-mariadb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      proyect: Wordpress_page_data
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        proyect: Wordpress_page_data
      name: mariadb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MARIADB_USER
          value: usuario_maria
        - name: MARIADB_PASSWORD
          value: qwe098
        - name: MARIADB_DATABASE
          value: datos_db
        - name: MARIADB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: qwer0987
        image: jarangos89/image_mariadb:latest
        name: mariadb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: persistent-storage-mariadb
      volumes:
      - name: persistent-storage-mariadb
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: pvc-mariadb

---

##### FILE: deploy_nginx_ori.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-d:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    estado: "1"
  name: nginx-d
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 2
  replicas: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  strategy:
    RollingUpdate:
      maXUnavailable: 1
      maxSurge: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx

##### FILE: deploy_nodeaffinity.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/timeserver:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: timeserver
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      pod: timeserver-pod
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        pod: timeserver-pod
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/arch
                operator: In
                values:
                - arm64
      containers:
      - image: docker.io/wdenniss/timeserver:5
        name: timeserver-container

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: timeserver
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 6
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      pod: timeserver-pod
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        pod: timeserver-pod
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/arch
                operator: In
                values:
                - arm64
                - amd64
      containers:
      - image: docker.io/wdenniss/timeserver:5
        name: timeserver-container
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 500m

##### FILE: deploy_nodeaffinity_preferred.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/timeserver:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: timeserver
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 6
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      pod: timeserver-pod
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        pod: timeserver-pod
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - preference:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/arch
                operator: In
                values:
                - arm64
            weight: 100
      containers:
      - image: docker.io/wdenniss/timeserver:5
        name: timeserver-container
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 500m

---

##### FILE: deploy_nodeaffinity_preferred-autopilot.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/timeserver:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: timeserver
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 6
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      pod: timeserver-pod
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        pod: timeserver-pod
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - preference:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/arch
                operator: In
                values:
                - arm64
            weight: 100
      containers:
      - image: docker.io/wdenniss/timeserver:5
        name: timeserver-container
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
      nodeSelector:
        cloud.google.com/compute-class: Scale-Out
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: kubernetes.io/arch
        operator: Equal
        value: arm64

---

##### FILE: deploy_python_script_4.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to example002/ConfigMap/fastapi-code-dm:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  app: |
    import sys
    import os
    import traceback
    import uvicorn
    from fastapi import FastAPI
    import kr8s.asyncio
    import copy

    class KubeApi:
      def __init__(self):
        self.api = None

    kube_api = KubeApi()
    app = FastAPI()

    @app.get("/")
    async def root():
        return {"message": "ok"}

    @app.get('/namespaces')
    async def namespaces():
      namespaces = list()
      result = dict()
      try:
        for namespace in await kr8s.asyncio.get('namespaces', api=kube_api.api):
          namespace_data = dict()
          namespace_raw_data = copy.deepcopy(namespace.raw)
          if 'metadata' in namespace_raw_data:
            if 'creationTimestamp' in namespace_raw_data['metadata']:
              namespace_data['CreateTimestamp'] = namespace_raw_data['metadata']['creationTimestamp']
            if 'labels' in namespace_raw_data['metadata']:
              namespace_data['Labels'] = namespace_raw_data['metadata']['labels']
          namespaces.append({"Name": namespace.metadata.name, "Metadata": namespace_data,})
        result = {"Namespaces": namespaces}
      except:
        print('EXCEPTION: {}'.format(traceback.format_exc()))
      return result

    if __name__ == '__main__':
      kube_config_file = os.getenv('KUBECONFIG', None)
      if kube_config_file is not None:
        kube_api.api = kr8s.api(kubeconfig=kube_config_file)
      uvicorn.run(app, host="0.0.0.0", port=8080, workers=1)
      print("DONE")
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: fastapi-code-dm
  namespace: example002

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0 

##### FILE: deploy_python_script_5.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to example002/Deployment/fastapi-test:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: fastapi-test
  name: fastapi-test
  namespace: example002
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: fastapi-test
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: fastapi-test
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - -c
        - python3 /tmp/app.py
        command:
        - /bin/sh
        image: ghcr.io/nicc777/container-python4aws:v3.12.1-1
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 3
        name: fastapi-test
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 3
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: fastapi-code-vol
          readOnly: true
      serviceAccountName: fastapi-serviceaccount
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: app
            path: app.py
          name: fastapi-code-dm
        name: fastapi-code-vol

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/dp-readiness:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: dp-readiness
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: python
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: python
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mario21ic/readiness-liveness:v1
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /live
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 6
          periodSeconds: 2
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 2
        name: web
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: web
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /ready
            port: 8080
          initialDelaySeconds: 6
          periodSeconds: 2
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 3

---

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ingress-nginx/DaemonSet/ingress-nginx-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.9.4
  name: ingress-nginx-controller
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 0
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
      app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.9.4
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - /nginx-ingress-controller
        - --election-id=ingress-nginx-leader
        - --controller-class=k8s.io/ingress-nginx
        - --ingress-class=nginx
        - --configmap=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/ingress-nginx-controller
        - --validating-webhook=:8443
        - --validating-webhook-certificate=/usr/local/certificates/cert
        - --validating-webhook-key=/usr/local/certificates/key
        - --watch-ingress-without-class=true
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: LD_PRELOAD
          value: /usr/local/lib/libmimalloc.so
        image: registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/google_containers/nginx-ingress-controller:v1.9.4
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        lifecycle:
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /wait-shutdown
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: controller
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: webhook
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 90Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: true
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_BIND_SERVICE
            drop:
            - ALL
          runAsUser: 101
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/local/certificates/
          name: webhook-cert
          readOnly: true
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      hostNetwork: true
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: ingress-nginx
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 300
      volumes:
      - name: webhook-cert
        secret:
          secretName: ingress-nginx-admission

---

        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 2000

        runAsUser: 2000

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ingress-nginx/DaemonSet/ingress-nginx-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: DaemonSet
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.9.5
  name: ingress-nginx-controller
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 0
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
      app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.9.5
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - /nginx-ingress-controller
        - --election-id=ingress-nginx-leader
        - --controller-class=k8s.io/ingress-nginx
        - --ingress-class=nginx
        - --configmap=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/ingress-nginx-controller
        - --validating-webhook=:8443
        - --validating-webhook-certificate=/usr/local/certificates/cert
        - --validating-webhook-key=/usr/local/certificates/key
        - --watch-ingress-without-class=true
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: LD_PRELOAD
          value: /usr/local/lib/libmimalloc.so
        image: registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/google_containers/nginx-ingress-controller:v1.9.5
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        lifecycle:
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /wait-shutdown
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: controller
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: webhook
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 90Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_BIND_SERVICE
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: false
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 101
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/local/certificates/
          name: webhook-cert
          readOnly: true
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      hostNetwork: true
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: ingress-nginx
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 300
      volumes:
      - name: webhook-cert
        secret:
          secretName: ingress-nginx-admission

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ingress-nginx/Job/ingress-nginx-admission-create:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: admission-webhook
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.9.5
  name: ingress-nginx-admission-create
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: admission-webhook
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.9.5
      name: ingress-nginx-admission-create
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - create
        - --host=ingress-nginx-controller-admission,ingress-nginx-controller-admission.$(POD_NAMESPACE).svc
        - --namespace=$(POD_NAMESPACE)
        - --secret-name=ingress-nginx-admission
        env:
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/google_containers/kube-webhook-certgen:v20231011-8b53cabe0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: create
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 65532
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      serviceAccountName: ingress-nginx-admission

apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:

    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx

  namespace: ingress-nginx

  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: admission-webhook
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.9.5
      name: ingress-nginx-admission-patch
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - patch
        - --webhook-name=ingress-nginx-admission
        - --namespace=$(POD_NAMESPACE)
        - --patch-mutating=false
        - --secret-name=ingress-nginx-admission
        - --patch-failure-policy=Fail
        env:
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: registry.cn-hangzhou.aliyuncs.com/google_containers/kube-webhook-certgen:v20231011-8b53cabe0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: patch
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
          runAsUser: 65532
          seccompProfile:
            type: RuntimeDefault
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      serviceAccountName: ingress-nginx-admission

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ingress-nginx/Deployment/ingress-nginx-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.1.2
    helm.sh/chart: ingress-nginx-4.0.18
  name: ingress-nginx-controller
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 0
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
      app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - /nginx-ingress-controller
        - --publish-service=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/ingress-nginx-controller
        - --election-id=ingress-controller-leader
        - --controller-class=k8s.io/ingress-nginx
        - --ingress-class=nginx
        - --configmap=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/ingress-nginx-controller
        - --validating-webhook=:8443
        - --validating-webhook-certificate=/usr/local/certificates/cert
        - --validating-webhook-key=/usr/local/certificates/key
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: LD_PRELOAD
          value: /usr/local/lib/libmimalloc.so
        image: k8s.gcr.io/ingress-nginx/controller:v1.1.2@sha256:28b11ce69e57843de44e3db6413e98d09de0f6688e33d4bd384002a44f78405c
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        lifecycle:
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /wait-shutdown
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: controller
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: webhook
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 90Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: true
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_BIND_SERVICE
            drop:
            - ALL
          runAsUser: 101
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/local/certificates/
          name: webhook-cert
          readOnly: true
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: ingress-nginx
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 300
      volumes:
      - name: webhook-cert
        secret:
          secretName: ingress-nginx-admission

        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.1.2

        name: create
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false

        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 2000
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 2000
      serviceAccountName: ingress-nginx-admission

    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx

  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:

    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: admission-webhook
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.1.2
        helm.sh/chart: ingress-nginx-4.0.18
      name: ingress-nginx-admission-patch
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - patch
        - --webhook-name=ingress-nginx-admission
        - --namespace=$(POD_NAMESPACE)
        - --patch-mutating=false
        - --secret-name=ingress-nginx-admission
        - --patch-failure-policy=Fail
        env:
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: k8s.gcr.io/ingress-nginx/kube-webhook-certgen:v1.1.1@sha256:64d8c73dca984af206adf9d6d7e46aa550362b1d7a01f3a0a91b20cc67868660
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: patch
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 2000
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 2000
      serviceAccountName: ingress-nginx-admission

    port: 443
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: https
  selector:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx

##### FILE: deploy_waf1_14.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ingress-nginx/Deployment/ingress-nginx-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.1.2
    helm.sh/chart: ingress-nginx-4.0.18
  name: ingress-nginx-controller
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 0
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
      app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
      app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: controller
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - /nginx-ingress-controller
        - --publish-service=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/ingress-nginx-controller
        - --election-id=ingress-controller-leader
        - --controller-class=k8s.io/ingress-nginx
        - --ingress-class=nginx
        - --configmap=$(POD_NAMESPACE)/ingress-nginx-controller
        - --validating-webhook=:8443
        - --validating-webhook-certificate=/usr/local/certificates/cert
        - --validating-webhook-key=/usr/local/certificates/key
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: LD_PRELOAD
          value: /usr/local/lib/libmimalloc.so
        image: k8s.gcr.io/ingress-nginx/controller:v1.1.2@sha256:28b11ce69e57843de44e3db6413e98d09de0f6688e33d4bd384002a44f78405c
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        lifecycle:
          preStop:
            exec:
              command:
              - /wait-shutdown
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 5
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: controller
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 443
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 8443
          name: webhook
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10254
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 90Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: true
          capabilities:
            add:
            - NET_BIND_SERVICE
            drop:
            - ALL
          runAsUser: 101
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/local/certificates/
          name: webhook-cert
          readOnly: true
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      serviceAccountName: ingress-nginx
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 300
      volumes:
      - name: webhook-cert
        secret:
          secretName: ingress-nginx-admission

---

metadata:

    helm.sh/hook: pre-install,pre-upgrade

  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: admission-webhook
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.1.2
    helm.sh/chart: ingress-nginx-4.0.18
  name: ingress-nginx-admission-create
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: admission-webhook
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.1.2
        helm.sh/chart: ingress-nginx-4.0.18
      name: ingress-nginx-admission-create
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - create
        - --host=ingress-nginx-controller-admission,ingress-nginx-controller-admission.$(POD_NAMESPACE).svc
        - --namespace=$(POD_NAMESPACE)
        - --secret-name=ingress-nginx-admission
        env:
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: k8s.gcr.io/ingress-nginx/kube-webhook-certgen:v1.1.1@sha256:64d8c73dca984af206adf9d6d7e46aa550362b1d7a01f3a0a91b20cc67868660
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: create
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 2000
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 2000
      serviceAccountName: ingress-nginx-admission

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ingress-nginx/Job/ingress-nginx-admission-patch:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  annotations:
    helm.sh/hook: post-install,post-upgrade
    helm.sh/hook-delete-policy: before-hook-creation,hook-succeeded
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: admission-webhook
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.1.2
    helm.sh/chart: ingress-nginx-4.0.18
  name: ingress-nginx-admission-patch
  namespace: ingress-nginx
spec:
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app.kubernetes.io/component: admission-webhook
        app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
        app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
        app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.1.2
        helm.sh/chart: ingress-nginx-4.0.18
      name: ingress-nginx-admission-patch
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - patch
        - --webhook-name=ingress-nginx-admission
        - --namespace=$(POD_NAMESPACE)
        - --patch-mutating=false
        - --secret-name=ingress-nginx-admission
        - --patch-failure-policy=Fail
        env:
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        image: k8s.gcr.io/ingress-nginx/kube-webhook-certgen:v1.1.1@sha256:64d8c73dca984af206adf9d6d7e46aa550362b1d7a01f3a0a91b20cc67868660
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: patch
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
      nodeSelector:
        kubernetes.io/os: linux
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 2000
        runAsNonRoot: true
        runAsUser: 2000
      serviceAccountName: ingress-nginx-admission

---

metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/component: admission-webhook
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: Helm
    app.kubernetes.io/name: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/part-of: ingress-nginx
    app.kubernetes.io/version: 1.1.2
    helm.sh/chart: ingress-nginx-4.0.18
  name: ingress-nginx-admission
  namespace: default
webhooks:
- admissionReviewVersions:
  - v1
  clientConfig:
    service:
      name: ingress-nginx-controller-admission
      namespace: ingress-nginx
      path: /networking/v1/ingresses
  failurePolicy: Fail
  matchPolicy: Equivalent
  name: validate.nginx.ingress.kubernetes.io
  rules:
  - apiGroups:
    - networking.k8s.io
    apiVersions:
    - v1
    operations:
    - CREATE
    - UPDATE
    resources:
    - ingresses
  sideEffects: None

---

Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: deploy-web
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: web
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: web
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: smlinux/hpa-example
        name: web
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 200m

##### FILE: deploy_webdav.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to ksv/Deployment/pod1:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: pod1
  namespace: ksv
spec:
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: pod1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: pod1
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: BASIC_AUTH
          value: "True"
        - name: WEBDAV_LOGGIN
          value: info
        - name: WEBDAV_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: user
              name: pod1-secret
        - name: WEBDAV_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: pod1-secret
        image: yechae/ksv-webdav:v1
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: webdav
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 200Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 100Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /uploads
          name: webdav-storage
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: webdav-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: pod1-pvc

---

kind: Deployment

  namespace: default

  replicas: 1

      app: plex
  template:

      labels:
        app: plex

        name: plex
        ports:
        - containerPort: 32400
        resources:
          limits:

            memory: 4Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 1Gi

##### FILE: deploy_worker2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/pi-worker:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: pi-worker
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      pod: pi
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        pod: pi
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: REDIS_HOST
          value: redis-0.redis-service
        - name: PYTHONUNBUFFERED
          value: "1"
        image: docker.io/wdenniss/pi_worker:4
        livenessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - ./check_liveness.sh
            - logs/lastrun.date
            - "300"
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 30
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1
        name: pi-container
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 120

---

            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace

          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:

##### FILE: Deployment_11.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/alpine-restricted:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: alpine-restricted
  name: alpine-restricted
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: alpine-restricted
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: alpine-restricted
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sleep
        - "3600"
        image: alpine:3.9
        name: alpine-restricted
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/demo
          name: sec-ctx-vol
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 2000
        runAsUser: 1000
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: sec-ctx-vol

---

##### FILE: Deployment_110.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nfs-client-provisioner:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nfs-client-provisioner
  name: nfs-client-provisioner
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nfs-client-provisioner
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nfs-client-provisioner
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PROVISIONER_NAME
          value: k8s-sigs.io/nfs-subdir-external-provisioner
        - name: NFS_SERVER
          value: MyNFSHostname
        - name: NFS_PATH
          value: /nfs/cpshare/
        image: k8s.gcr.io/sig-storage/nfs-subdir-external-provisioner:v4.0.2
        name: nfs-client-provisioner
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /persistentvolumes
          name: nfs-client-root
      serviceAccountName: nfs-client-provisioner
      volumes:
      - name: nfs-client-root
        nfs:
          path: /nfs/cpshare/
          server: MyNFSHostname

---

kind: Deployment

    app: aspnet-core-app
  name: test-dep
  namespace: default

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      component: web
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        component: web
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: simpleweb
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 10
          httpGet:
            path: /health/LP
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 2
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: csimpleweb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: k8s-probes
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        startupProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - cat
            - /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
          failureThreshold: 1
          initialDelaySeconds: 1
          periodSeconds: 2
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: curl-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: curlpod
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: curlpod
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - while true; do sleep 1; done
        image: radial/busyboxplus:curl
        name: curlpod
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/ssl
          name: secret-volume
      volumes:
      - name: secret-volume
        secret:
          secretName: nginxsecret

---

    app: training

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to development/Deployment/pod-info-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: pod-info
  name: pod-info-deployment
  namespace: development
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: pod-info
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: pod-info
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        image: kimschles/pod-info-app:latest
        name: pod-info-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 64Mi

kind: Deployment

    app: frontend
    name: test
  name: test-deploy
  namespace: default

  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: hello-world
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kubernetes.io/change-cause: Changed image to amigoscode/kubernetes:hello-world-v4
      labels:
        name: hello-world
      name: hello-world
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: amigoscode/kubernetes:hello-world-v4
        name: hello-world
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to privileged/Deployment/alpine-privileged:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: alpine-privileged
  name: alpine-privileged
  namespace: privileged
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: alpine-privileged
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: alpine-privileged
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sleep
        - "1800"
        image: alpine:3.9
        name: alpine-privileged
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: true
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: false
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/demo
          name: sec-ctx-vol
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 2000
        runAsUser: 1000
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: sec-ctx-vol

---

kind: Deployment

    app: application-nginx

      app: application-nginx

        app: application-nginx

        imagePullPolicy: Always
        livenessProbe:

            command:
            - /bin/sh
            - -c
            - /usr/bin/my-application-jobs --alive
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: my-application-jobs

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/web:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: web
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  serviceName: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: k8x.gcr.io/nginx-slim:0.8
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: web
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            host: null
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Host
              value: nginxapp.com
            path: /
            port: 8080
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 1
          periodSeconds: 2
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: alpine-multy
  name: alpine-multy
  namespace: multy
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: alpine-multy
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: alpine-multy
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sleep
        - "2400"
        image: alpine:3.9
        name: alpine-multy
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: false
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 2000
        runAsUser: 1000

---

##### FILE: deployment_3_autoscaling_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/HorizontalPodAutoscaler/my-autoscaling:
apiVersion: autoscaling/v2
kind: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
metadata:
  name: my-autoscaling
  namespace: default
spec:
  maxReplicas: 6
  metrics:
  - resource:
      name: cpu
      target:
        averageUtilization: 70
        type: Utilization
    type: Resource
  - resource:
      name: memory
      target:
        averageUtilization: 80
        type: Utilization
    type: Resource
  minReplicas: 2
  scaleTargetRef:
    apiVersion: apps/v2beta1v1
    kind: Deployment
    name: my-web-deployment-autoscaling

---

##### FILE: Deployment_31.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: web
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 5
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: web
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: web
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

---

##### FILE: Deployment_32.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/web:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: web
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  serviceName: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: k8x.gcr.io/nginx-slim:0.8
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: web
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          httpGet:
            host: null
            httpHeaders:
            - name: Host
              value: nginxapp.com
            path: /
            port: 80
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 1
          periodSeconds: 2
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 1

---

        app: nginx

        name: nginx

        - containerPort: 80
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 1
          initialDelaySeconds: 1
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          tcpSocket:
            host: null
            port: 80
          timeoutSeconds: 1

      labels:
        app: application-nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: quay.io/<username>/nginx:latest
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: application-nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8443
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /index.html
            port: 8443
            scheme: HTTPS
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5

##### FILE: Deployment_affinity.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - labelSelector:
              matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - nginx
            topologyKey: zone
      containers:
      - image: nginx:latest
        name: nginx
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /mnt/
          name: vol-nginx
      volumes:
      - name: vol-nginx
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: pvc-nginx

---

##### FILE: deployment_alpha.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/falcon-auth-app-alpha:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: falcon-auth-app-alpha
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: falcon-auth-app-alpha
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: falcon-auth-app-alpha
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ALHPA_DB_HOST
          value: localhost
        - name: ALHPA_DB_PORT
          value: "5432"
        - name: ALHPA_DB_NAME
          value: mydatabase
        - name: ALHPA_DB_USER
          value: arnavgoel
        - name: ALHPA_DB_PASSWORD
          value: mypassword
        - name: ALPHA_SERVER_NAME
          value: localhost
        - name: SERVER_PORT
          value: "8000"
        image: your-docker-registry/falcon-auth-app:alpha
        name: falcon-auth-app-alpha
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 750m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi

      app: api-gateway

      - image: dev.local/api_gateway:0.0.1

        name: api-gateway
        ports:

##### FILE: deployment_cm_file.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/python-web-app-deployment-configmap-example:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: python-web-app
  name: python-web-app-deployment-configmap-example
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: python-web-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: python-web-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DB-PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: db-port
              name: test-cm
        image: raghumn/k8s-notes-python-web-app
        name: web-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /opt/db/
          name: db-connection
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: test-cm-file
        name: db-connection

---

##### FILE: Deployment_ConfigMap_Service.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:latest
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /index.html
            port: 80
            scheme: HTTP
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html/
          name: nginx-public
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: nginx-index-html-configmap
        name: nginx-public

---

##### FILE: Deployment_configmap1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/customer:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: packersmovers
    tier: backend
  name: customer
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 10
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 4
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: packersmovers
      tier: backend
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: packersmovers
        tier: backend
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DB_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: db-username
              name: customer-config-map
        - name: DB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: db-password
              name: customer-config-map
        - name: DB_ENDPOINT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: db-endpoint
              name: customer-config-map
        image: 637423236688.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/spring:11
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: customer
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081

---

  minReplicas: 1

##### FILE: deployment_definition.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: myapp
    type: front-end
  name: nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - echo Hello Kubernetes! && sleep 3600
        image: nginx:latest
        name: nginx

---

kind: Deployment

  labels:
    app: myapp
    type: front-end
  name: myapp-deployment
  namespace: default

  replicas: 3

    matchLabels:
      type: front-end
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: my-app
        type: front-end
      name: myapp-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx-container

##### FILE: deployment_desafio.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-girus:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx-girus
    opa: sensacional-juvenal
  name: nginx-girus
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 5
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-girus
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-girus
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.16.0
        name: nginx
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 0.5
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 0.3
            memory: 64Mi

---

1 - autogen-require-drop-cap-net-raw validation failure: Containers must drop the `CAP_NET_RAW` capability.

##### FILE: deployment_dev.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/falcon-auth-app-dev:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: falcon-auth-app-dev
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: falcon-auth-app-dev
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: falcon-auth-app-dev
    spec:
      containers:
      - autoscale:
          enabled: true
          maxReplicas: 10
          minReplicas: 3
          targetCPUUtilizationPercentage: 75
        env:
        - name: DEV_DB_HOST
          value: localhost
        - name: DEV_DB_PORT
          value: "5432"
        - name: DEV_DB_NAME
          value: dev_database
        - name: DEV_DB_USER
          value: dev_user
        - name: DEV_DB_PASSWORD
          value: dev_password
        - name: DEV_SERVER_NAME
          value: localhost
        - name: DEV_SERVER_PORT
          value: "8000"
        image: your-docker-registry/falcon-auth-app:dev
        metrics:
          enabled: true
          path: /metrics
          port: 8000
          scheme: HTTP
        name: falcon-auth-app-dev
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 750m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi

---

          value: hash

##### FILE: deployment_example.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to skool/Deployment/mount-holder:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mount-holder
  namespace: skool
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mount-holder
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mount-holder
        policy-type: app
        try: "0"
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: mount-holder
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /mnt/secrets-store
          name: secrets-store-inline
          readOnly: true
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - csi:
          driver: secrets-store.csi.k8s.io
          nodePublishSecretRef:
            name: secrets-store-creds
          readOnly: true
          volumeAttributes:
            secretProviderClass: azure-kv-secrets
        name: secrets-store-inline

---

kind: Deployment
metadata:

  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3

    matchLabels:
      app: falcon-auth-app-gamma
  template:

        app: falcon-auth-app-gamma

      - autoscale:
          enabled: true
          maxReplicas: 10
          minReplicas: 3
          targetCPUUtilizationPercentage: 75

          value: localhost
        - name: GAMMA_DB_PORT
          value: "5432"
        - name: GAMMA_DB_NAME
          value: dev_database
        - name: GAMMA_DB_USER
          value: dev_user
        - name: GAMMA_DB_PASSWORD
          value: dev_password
        - name: GAMMA_SERVER_NAME
          value: localhost
        - name: GAMMA_SERVER_PORT
          value: "8000"
        image: your-docker-registry/falcon-auth-app:gamma
        metrics:
          enabled: true
          path: /metrics
          port: 8000
          scheme: HTTP
        name: falcon-auth-app-gamma
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 750m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi

##### FILE: deployment_hashgen.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to string-ns/Deployment/flask-app-string-generator-dep:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: flask-app-string-generator-dep
  namespace: string-ns
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: flask-app-string-generator
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: flask-app-string-generator
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MESSAGE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: MESSAGE
              name: example-configmap
        image: dpuertamartos/flask-app-string-generator
        name: flask-app-string-generator
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/src/app/files
          name: shared-txt
      - image: dpuertamartos/flask-app-timestamp-generator
        name: flask-app-timestamp-generator
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/src/app/files
          name: shared-txt
      volumes:
      - name: shared-txt
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: flask-app-string-generator-claim

---


Mutation:

##### FILE: Deployment_Health.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/flask-app:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: flask-app
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: flask-app
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: flask-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGO_HOST
          value: mongo-db-service
        - name: MONGO_PORT
          value: "27017"
        - name: FAILURE_MODE
          value: "true"
        image: tr2452/my_todo_app:v4
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 5000
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: flask-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /ready
            port: 5000
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 5

---


Mutation:

kind: Deployment

  name: hello-world-app
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: hello-world-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: hello-world-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: kubeje2/hello-world-app:3
        name: hello-world-app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/stress-ng:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: stress-ng
  name: stress-ng
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: stress-ng
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: stress-ng
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --cpu
        - "1"
        command:
        - stress-ng
        image: alexeiled/stress-ng:latest-ubuntu
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: stress-ng

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:latest
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 128Mi

##### FILE: deployment_hpa1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/deployappfront:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: deployappfront
  name: deployappfront
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: deployappfront
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: deployappfront
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: frontendapp
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 125m
            memory: 64Mi

---

##### FILE: deployment_hpa1_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/HorizontalPodAutoscaler/hpa:
apiVersion: autoscaling/v2
kind: HorizontalPodAutoscaler
metadata:
  name: hpa
  namespace: default
spec:
  maxReplicas: 4
  metrics:
  - resource:
      name: cpu
      target:
        averageUtilization: 50
        type: Utilization
    type: Resource
  minReplicas: 1
  scaleTargetRef:
    apiVersion: apps/v1
    kind: Deployment
    name: deployappfront

---

##### FILE: Deployment_itop.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/itop-deployment-eslem:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: itop-deployment-eslem
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: itop
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: itop
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ITOP_DB_HOST
          value: mariadb-service
        - name: ITOP_DB_NAME
          value: itop
        - name: ITOP_DB_USER
          value: itop
        - name: ITOP_DB_PASS
          value: itop
        - name: PHP_TIMEZONE
          value: Europe/Paris
        - name: PHP_ENABLE_UPLOADS
          value: "1"
        - name: PHP_MEMORY_LIMIT
          value: 256M
        - name: PHP_POST_MAX_SIZE
          value: 64M
        - name: PHP_UPLOAD_MAX_FILESIZE
          value: 32M
        - name: PHP_MAX_FILE_UPLOADS
          value: "20"
        - name: PHP_MAX_INPUT_TIME
          value: "60"
        - name: PHP_LOG_ERRORS
          value: "On"
        - name: PHP_ERROR_REPORTING
          value: E_ALL & ~E_DEPRECATED & ~E_STRICT
        image: bouzidieslem/itop:latest
        name: itop
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
          requests:
            cpu: 200m
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/www/html/data
          name: itop-data
      volumes:
      - name: itop-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: pvc-itop

---
