policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/itop-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: itop-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: itop
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: itop
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ITOP_DB_HOST
          value: itop
        - name: ITOP_DB_NAME
          value: itop
        - name: ITOP_DB_USER
          value: itop
        - name: ITOP_DB_PASS
          value: itop
        - name: PHP_TIMEZONE
          value: Europe/Paris
        - name: PHP_ENABLE_UPLOADS
          value: "1"
        - name: PHP_MEMORY_LIMIT
          value: 256M
        - name: PHP_POST_MAX_SIZE
          value: 64M
        - name: PHP_UPLOAD_MAX_FILESIZE
          value: 32M
        - name: PHP_MAX_FILE_UPLOADS
          value: "20"
        - name: PHP_MAX_INPUT_TIME
          value: "60"
        - name: PHP_LOG_ERRORS
          value: "On"
        - name: PHP_ERROR_REPORTING
          value: E_ALL & ~E_DEPRECATED & ~E_STRICT
        image: bouzidieslem/itop:latest
        name: itop
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

---

    run: nginx
  name: meu-nginx
  namespace: default

  replicas: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      run: nginx
  template:

      labels:
        run: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 256Mi
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      restartPolicy: Always
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30

##### FILE: Deployment_Limits.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-web:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx-web
  name: nginx-web
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-web
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-web
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.16.0
        name: nginx
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 0.7
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 0.5
            memory: 64Mi

---

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mariadb-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mariadb-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mariadb
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mariadb
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: itop
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: itop
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          value: itop
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          value: itop
        image: mariadb:10.4
        name: mariadb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mariadb-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mariadb-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mariadb-pvc

##### FILE: deployment_mongodb_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mongodb-v1:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mongodb
    version: v1
  name: mongodb-v1
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mongodb
      version: v1
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: mongodb
        version: v1
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: 152175719540.dkr.ecr.eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/book-ecr-repo:mongodb-4fbc745
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: mongodb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 300m
            memory: 700Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 25m
            memory: 64Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: data-db
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: data-db

---

##### FILE: deployment_mysql.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysqldb-v1:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mysqldb
    version: v1
  name: mysqldb-v1
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysqldb
      version: v1
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: mysqldb
        version: v1
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --default-authentication-plugin
        - mysql_native_password
        env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: rootpasswd
              name: mysql-credentials
        image: 152175719540.dkr.ecr.eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/book-ecr-repo:mysql-686cc6e
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: mysqldb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 300m
            memory: 700Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 25m
            memory: 64Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: var-lib-mysql
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: var-lib-mysql

---

##### FILE: deployment_nginx2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: myapp-dep
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: myapp-dep
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /bin/sh
        - -c
        - sh /home/script.sh && nginx -g 'daemon off;'
        image: nginx
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 60
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: nginx-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 90
          periodSeconds: 10
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /home/
          name: script-file
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: script-index
        name: script-file

---

##### FILE: deployment_patch.yaml #####

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/onex-apiserver:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: onex-apiserver
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchExpressions:
                - key: app
                  operator: In
                  values:
                  - onex-apiserver
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
            weight: 100
      containers:
      - args:
        - --secure-port=52010
        - --bind-address=0.0.0.0
        - --etcd-servers=127.0.0.1:2379
        - --client-ca-file=/opt/onex/cert/ca.pem
        - --tls-cert-file=/opt/onex/cert/onex-apiserver.pem
        - --tls-private-key-file=/opt/onex/cert/onex-apiserver-key.pem
        - --enable-admission-plugins=NamespaceAutoProvision,NamespaceExists,NamespaceLifecycle
        - --v=10
        image: ccr.ccs.tencentyun.com/superproj/onex-apiserver-amd64:v1.0.0
        livenessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 52010
        name: onex-apiserver
        ports:
        - containerPort: 52010
          name: https
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 52010
        startupProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 52010

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/onex-controller-manager:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: onex-controller-manager
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchExpressions:
                - key: app
                  operator: In
                  values:
                  - onex-controller-manager
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
            weight: 100
      containers:
      - args:
        - --kubeconfig=/opt/onex/conf/config
        - --config=/opt/onex/conf/onex-controller-manager.yaml
        - --v=10
        image: ccr.ccs.tencentyun.com/superproj/onex-controller-manager-amd64:v1.0.0
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 20250
        name: onex-controller-manager
        ports:
        - containerPort: 10249
          name: metrics
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 20250
          name: health
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 20250
        startupProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 20250
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /opt/onex/conf/onex-controller-manager.yaml
          name: onex-controller-manager
          subPath: onex-controller-manager.yaml
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          items:
          - key: onex-controller-manager.yaml
            path: onex-controller-manager.yaml
          name: onex-controller-manager
        name: onex-controller-manager

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: onex-gateway
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchExpressions:
                - key: app
                  operator: In
                  values:
                  - onex-gateway
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
            weight: 100
      containers:
      - args:
        - --config=/opt/onex/conf/onex-gateway.yaml
        image: ccr.ccs.tencentyun.com/superproj/onex-gateway-amd64:v1.0.0
        livenessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 38443
        name: onex-gateway
        ports:
        - containerPort: 38443
          name: http-https
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 39090
          name: grpc
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 38443
        startupProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 38443
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /opt/onex/conf/onex-gateway.yaml
          name: onex-gateway
          subPath: onex-gateway.yaml
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          items:
          - key: onex-gateway.yaml
            path: onex-gateway.yaml
          name: onex-gateway
        name: onex-gateway

##### FILE: deployment_patch3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/onex-miner-controller:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: onex-miner-controller
  namespace: default
spec:
  template:
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - podAffinityTerm:
              labelSelector:
                matchExpressions:
                - key: app
                  operator: In
                  values:
                  - onex-miner-controller
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
            weight: 100
      containers:
      - args:
        - --kubeconfig=/opt/onex/conf/config
        - --provider-kubeconfig=/opt/onex/conf/config.kind
        - --in-cluster=true
        - --config=/opt/onex/conf/onex-miner-controller.yaml
        - --v=10
        image: ccr.ccs.tencentyun.com/superproj/onex-miner-controller-amd64:v1.0.0
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 20250
        name: onex-miner-controller
        ports:
        - containerPort: 20251
          name: metrics
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 20250
          name: health
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /readyz
            port: 20250
        startupProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 20250
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /opt/onex/conf/onex-miner-controller.yaml
          name: onex-miner-controller
          subPath: onex-miner-controller.yaml
        - mountPath: /opt/onex/conf/config.kind
          name: onex-miner-controller
          subPath: config.kind
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          items:
          - key: onex-miner-controller.yaml
            path: onex-miner-controller.yaml
          - key: config.kind
            path: config.kind
          name: onex-miner-controller
        name: onex-miner-controller

---

                  - onex-usercenter
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/hostname
            weight: 100
      containers:
      - args:
        - --config=/opt/onex/conf/onex-usercenter.yaml
        image: ccr.ccs.tencentyun.com/superproj/onex-usercenter-amd64:v1.0.0
        livenessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 38443
        name: onex-usercenter
        ports:
        - containerPort: 38443
          name: http-https
          protocol: TCP
        - containerPort: 39090
          name: grpc
          protocol: TCP
        readinessProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 38443
        startupProbe:
          tcpSocket:
            port: 38443
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /opt/onex/conf/onex-usercenter.yaml
          name: onex-usercenter
          subPath: onex-usercenter.yaml
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          defaultMode: 420
          items:
          - key: onex-usercenter.yaml
            path: onex-usercenter.yaml
          name: onex-usercenter
        name: onex-usercenter

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/postgres-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: postgres
  name: postgres-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: postgres
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: postgres
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          value: murdok43
        image: postgres:latest
        name: postgres
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "1"
            memory: 2Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 512Mi
        securityContext:
          fsGroup: 999
          runAsGroup: 999
          runAsUser: 999
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
          name: postgres-storage
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - mkdir -p /var/lib/postgresql/data && chown -R 999:999 /var/lib/postgresql/data
        image: busybox
        name: init-permissions
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
          name: postgres-storage
      securityContext:
        fsGroup: 999
      volumes:
      - name: postgres-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: pvc-postgres

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/falcon-auth-app-prod:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: falcon-auth-app-prod
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: falcon-auth-app-prod
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: falcon-auth-app-prod
    spec:
      containers:
      - autoscale:
          enabled: true
          maxReplicas: 10
          minReplicas: 3
          targetCPUUtilizationPercentage: 75
        env:
        - name: PROD_DB_HOST
          value: prod_host
        - name: PROD_DB_PORT
          value: prod_port
        - name: PROD_DB_NAME
          value: prod_database
        - name: PROD_DB_USER
          value: prod_user
        - name: PROD_DB_PASSWORD
          value: prod_password
        - name: PROD_SERVER_NAME
          value: localhost
        - name: PROD_SERVER_PORT
          value: "8000"
        image: your-docker-registry/falcon-auth-app:prod
        metrics:
          enabled: true
          path: /metrics
          port: 8000
          scheme: HTTP
        name: falcon-auth-app-prod
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 750m
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi

      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30

##### FILE: deployment_reviews_v1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/reviews-v1:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: reviews
    version: v1
  name: reviews-v1
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: reviews
      version: v1
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: reviews
        version: v1
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: LOG_DIR
          value: /tmp/logs
        image: docker.io/istio/examples-bookinfo-reviews-v1:1.18.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: reviews
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9080
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 300m
            memory: 700Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 25m
            memory: 64Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /tmp
          name: tmp
        - mountPath: /opt/ibm/wlp/output
          name: wlp-output
      serviceAccountName: bookinfo-reviews
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: wlp-output
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: tmp

---

kind: Deployment

  name: reviews-v3
  namespace: default

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: reviews
      version: v3

    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: reviews
        version: v3
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: LOG_DIR
          value: /tmp/logs
        image: 152175719540.dkr.ecr.eu-west-1.amazonaws.com/book-ecr-repo:reviews-d122754
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: reviews
        ports:
        - containerPort: 9080
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 300m
            memory: 700Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 25m
            memory: 64Mi

          name: tmp
        - mountPath: /opt/ibm/wlp/output
          name: wlp-output

      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: wlp-output
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: tmp

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: rtmp-server
  namespace: default

  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: rtmp-server

    metadata:
      labels:
        app: rtmp-server
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: bluenviron/mediamtx:1.8.2-ffmpeg
        name: rtmp-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 1935
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /mediamtx.yml
          name: config
          readOnly: true
          subPath: mediamtx.yml
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: rtmp-server-config
        name: config

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: rtmp-server
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: rtmp-server
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: rtmp-server
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: bluenviron/mediamtx:1.8.2-ffmpeg
        name: rtmp-server
        ports:
        - containerPort: 1935
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /mediamtx.yml
          name: config
          readOnly: true
          subPath: mediamtx.yml
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: rtmp-server-config
        name: config

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/test-for-sc:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: test-for-sc
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: myapp-sc
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: myapp-sc
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - echo "reading and writing logs" && touch /mnt/share/logs.txt && tail -f
          /mnt/share/logs.txt
        image: wbitt/network-multitool
        name: multitool-with-sc
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /mnt/share
          name: sc-volume
      volumes:
      - name: sc-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mypvc-sc

---

##### FILE: deployment_secrets.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/customer:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: packersmovers
    tier: backend
  name: customer
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 10
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 4
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: packersmovers
      tier: backend
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: packersmovers
        tier: backend
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DB_USERNAME
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: db-username
              name: customer-secrets
        - name: DB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: db-password
              name: customer-secrets
        - name: DB_ENDPOINT
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: db-endpoint
              name: customer-secrets
        image: 637423236688.dkr.ecr.us-east-1.amazonaws.com/spring:11
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: customer
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8081

---

        - containerPort: 8443
        volumeMounts:

          name: secret
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/conf.d
          name: config-volume
      volumes:
      - name: secret
        secret:
          secretName: nlb-tls-app-secret
      - configMap:
          name: secure-config
        name: config-volume

##### FILE: Deployment_Service_ConfigMap_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ConfigMap/secure-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  app.conf: |-
    server {
      listen 8443 ssl proxy_protocol;
      real_ip_header proxy_protocol;
      set_real_ip_from 192.168.0.0/16;
      server_name <your_server_name>;

      ssl_certificate /etc/nginx/ssl/tls.crt;
      ssl_certificate_key /etc/nginx/ssl/tls.key;

      default_type text/plain;

      location / {
        return 200 "hello from pod $hostname\n";
      }
    }
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  name: secure-config
  namespace: default

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

  namespace: default

  ingressClassName: nginx
  rules:
  - host: host1.domain.ext
    http:
      paths:

          service:
            name: hello-world
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix

    - host1.domain.ext
    - host2.domain.ext
    secretName: hello-kubernetes-tls

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mydog-nginx:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: mydog-nginx
  name: mydog-nginx
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mydog-nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mydog-nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: html-volume
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: mydog-html
        name: html-volume

---

kind: Ingress
metadata:
  annotations:
    cert-manager.io/cluster-issuer: letsencrypt-prod
    kubernetes.io/ingress.class: nginx
  name: nginx-ingress
  namespace: default
spec:
  rules:
  - host: nginxapp.fosstechnix.info
    http:
      paths:
      - backend:
          service:
            name: nginx-app
            port:
              number: 80
        path: /
        pathType: Prefix

    - nginxapp.fosstechnix.info

##### FILE: Deployment_Service3_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: asvignesh
  name: mysql
  namespace: default
spec:
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: asvignesh
      tier: mysql
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: asvignesh
        tier: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          value: password
        image: mysql:5.6
        name: mysql
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3306
          name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: mysql-persistent-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: _PVC_

---

##### FILE: Deployment_Service5_1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/typo3:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: typo3
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: typo3
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: typo3
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: app
                operator: In
                values:
                - typo3
      containers:
      - image: image:typo3
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        name: typo3
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

          claimName: my-claim

            cpu: "1"
            memory: 512Mi

            name: pgbouncer-configmap

            name: pgbouncer-secrets

        name: pgbouncer

            cpu: "1"
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/<template>:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: <template>
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: <template>
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: <template>
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: SECRETS_TABLE
          value: <template>
        - name: FQDN
          value: <template>
        - name: KEY_ARN
          value: <template>
        - name: ENCLAVE_IMAGE_URI_SSM
          value: <template>
        - name: VSOCK_BASE_PORT
          value: <template>
        - name: LOG_LEVEL
          value: <template>
        - name: LISTEN_ADDRESS
          value: 0.0.0.0:8080
        - name: CERT_FILE
          value: cert.pem
        - name: KEY_FILE
          value: private-key.pem
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        - name: POD_SERVICE_ACCOUNT
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.serviceAccountName
        image: <template>
        name: <template>
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        resources:
          limits:
            aws.ec2.nitro/nitro_enclaves: "1"
            cpu: 250m
            hugepages-1Gi: 2Gi
          requests:
            aws.ec2.nitro/nitro_enclaves: "1"
            hugepages-1Gi: 2Gi
      serviceAccountName: <template>
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        operator: Exists
      - effect: NoExecute
        operator: Exists
      volumes:
      - emptyDir:
          medium: HugePages-1Gi
        name: hugepage-1gi

---

kind: Deployment

  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3

      app: fedora-app

      labels:
        app: fedora-app

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx-deployment
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-deployment
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-deployment
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.16.0
        name: nginx
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.25"
            memory: 128Mi

---

      maxSurge: 25%!

(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: validation-service
    spec:
      containers:

        name: validation-service-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to csci5409/Service/validation-k8-service:
apiVersion: v1
kind: Service
metadata:
  labels:
    app: validation-service
  name: validation-k8-service
  namespace: csci5409
spec:
  ports:
  - port: 80
    protocol: TCP
    targetPort: 80
  selector:
    app: validation-service

##### FILE: deployments.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/app1:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: app1
    version: v1
  name: app1
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: app1
      version: v1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: app1
        version: v1
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        image: app1
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        name: app1
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8001
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 600Mi
      serviceAccountName: service-account1

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: web
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 5
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: web
  strategy:
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: web
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: my-pv-storage
      volumes:
      - name: my-pv-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: my-pv-claim

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: web
  name: rss-site
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: web
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: web
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: front-end
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
      - image: nickchase/rss-php-nginx:v1
        name: rss-reader
        ports:
        - containerPort: 88

  namespace: default

  replicas: 3

    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-deploy

      name: nginx-deploy
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.21.1/2/3
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: nginx

        - containerPort: 80
          name: http

##### FILE: Deployments_Canary-V1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/helloworld:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: helloworld
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 5
  replicas: 3
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: helloworld
        track: stable
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: educative/helloworld:1.0
        name: helloworld
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
          requests:
            cpu: 50m

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/hello-deploy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: hello-deploy
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 10
  replicas: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: hello-world
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: hello-world
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: educative/k8sbook:latest
        name: hello-Pod
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

---

##### FILE: Deployments_RollingUpdate.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/hello-deploy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: hello-deploy
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 10
  replicas: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: hello-world
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: hello-world
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: educative/k8sbook:latest
        name: hello-Pod
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

---

##### FILE: Deployments_RollingUpdate_3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/myapp-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: web
  name: myapp-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  intervalSeconds: 5
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: web
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 3
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: web
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: front-end
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 40
  timeoutSeconds: 100
  updatePeriodSeconds: 5

---

##### FILE: Deployments_RollingUpdate_5.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/frontapp:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: frontapp
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 30
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchExpressions:
    - key: app
      operator: In
      values:
      - web
      - frontend
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 3
      maxUnavailable: 1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: httpd
        name: apache
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

---

##### FILE: deployments1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/form-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: form-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: form
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: form
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DB_HOST
          value: mysql-service
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_PASSWORD
              name: mysql-secrets
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
              name: mysql-secrets
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_DATABASE
              name: mysql-secrets
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_USER
              name: mysql-secrets
        image: gcr.io/kubernetes-work-396809/form1
        name: form
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

---

  name: web
  namespace: default

  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: widgetario
      component: web
  template:

      labels:
        app: widgetario
        component: web
        hackathon: part-1
    spec:

      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: web-features
        image: widgetario/web:21.03
        name: app
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /app/secrets
          name: api-config
          readOnly: true
      volumes:
      - name: api-config
        secret:
          secretName: web-api

kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: busybox
  name: deployment03
  namespace: default

  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: busybox
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: busybox
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - podAffinityTerm:
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/something
            weight: 2
      containers:
      - image: busybox:1.35
        name: busybox
        resources: {}

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to staging/Deployment/deployment01:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: busybox
  name: deployment01
  namespace: staging
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: busybox
  strategy: {}
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: busybox
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sleep
        - "3600"
        image: busybox:1.35
        name: busybox
      - command:
        - sleep
        - "3600"
        image: busybox:1.28
        name: busybox02

##### FILE: deployments27.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/producer:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: producer
  name: producer
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: producer
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        prometheus.io/path: /metrics
        prometheus.io/port: "3000"
        prometheus.io/scrape: "true"
      labels:
        app: producer
    spec:
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: producer-env
        image: deirofelippe/producer-anotaai-challenge:v2.1
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 3000
          periodSeconds: 5
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 2
        name: producer
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 3000
          periodSeconds: 3
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 2
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 250Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 150Mi
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 30
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 3000
          periodSeconds: 3
      serviceAccountName: read-service-account

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/fast-api:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: fast-api
  name: fast-api
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: fast-api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: fast-api
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: ENV
          value: Civo
        image: 1abdulrehman/k8s-fastapi:0.03
        name: fast-api
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 300m
            memory: 400Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 200m
            memory: 300Mi

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/deployment03:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: busybox
  name: deployment03
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: busybox
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: busybox
    spec:
      affinity:
        podAntiAffinity:
          preferredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
          - podAffinityTerm:
              topologyKey: kubernetes.io/something
            weight: 2
      containers:
      - image: busybox:1.35
        name: busybox
        resources: {}

##### FILE: deployments38.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/db:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: db
  name: db
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: db
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: db
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: POSTGRES_USER
          value: postgres
        - name: POSTGRES_PASSWORD
          value: postgres
        image: postgres:15-alpine
        name: postgres
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5432
          name: postgres
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/postgresql/data
          name: db-data
      volumes:
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: db-data

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: app1
    version: v1
  name: app1
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: app1
      version: v1
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: app1
        version: v1
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: NODE_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: spec.nodeName
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        image: app1
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        name: app1
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8001
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 1000m
            memory: 600Mi
      serviceAccountName: service-account1

##### FILE: Deployments41.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/vsftpd:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: vsftpd
  name: vsftpd
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: vsftpd
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: vsftpd
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: vsftpd-alpine:v1
        imagePullPolicy: Never
        name: vsftpd
        ports:
        - containerPort: 21
          hostPort: 21
        - containerPort: 21000
          hostPort: 21000
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data
          name: vsftpd-persistent-storage
        - mountPath: /auth
          name: cluster-authentication
        - mountPath: /var/log
          name: varlog
        - mountPath: /cert
          name: certificate
      serviceAccount: pod-service-access
      volumes:
      - name: vsftpd-persistent-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: vsftpd-pv-claim
      - name: cluster-authentication
        secret:
          secretName: cluster-authentication
      - name: certificate
        secret:
          secretName: vsftpd-cert
      - emptyDir: {}
        name: varlog

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: kafkaconsumer
  name: kafkaconsumer
  namespace: keda-eventhubkafka-demo
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: kafkaconsumer
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: kafkaconsumer
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: Kafka__BootstrapServers
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: kafka_bootstrapservers
              name: keda-kafka-secrets
        - name: Kafka__Topic
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: kafka_topic
              name: keda-kafka-secrets
        - name: Kafka__SaslPassword
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: keda-kafka-secrets
        image: nos98/kafkaservices:consumer
        name: kafkaconsumer
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

kind: Deployment

  name: deployment-1
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: busybox-pod
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: busybox-pod
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - echo Hello Kubernetes! && sleep 3600
        image: busybox
        name: busybox-container
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 300Mi

##### FILE: deployments48.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/my-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: my-app
  name: my-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  desiredReplicas: 3
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: my-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: my-app
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: kubernetes.io/hostname
                operator: In
                values:
                - minikube
      containers:
      - envFrom:
        - configMapRef:
            name: my-config-map
        image: nginx:latest
        labels:
          app: my-app
        name: my-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
            memory: 64Mi
        tolerations:
        - effect: NoSchedule
          key: key
          operator: Equal
          value: value
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: my-volume
      volumes:
      - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
        name: my-volume

---


Mutation:

##### FILE: deployments49.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/example-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: example-app
  name: example-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: example-app
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 0
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: example-app
        version: v01
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: python
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: example-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 256Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 50m
            memory: 64Mi

---

##### FILE: deployments5.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/form-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: form-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: form
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: form
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: DB_HOST
          value: mysql-service
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_PASSWORD
              name: mysql-secrets
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
              name: mysql-secrets
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_DATABASE
              name: mysql-secrets
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_USER
              name: mysql-secrets
        image: gcr.io/kubernetes-work-396809/form1
        name: form
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080

---

policy add-networkpolicy applied to default/Namespace/frontend:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: default-deny
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-deny
  namespace: frontend
spec:
  podSelector: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Ingress
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/frontend:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: frontend
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

---


Generate:
Generation completed successfully.
policy add-ns-quota applied to default/Namespace/frontend:
apiVersion: v1
kind: ResourceQuota
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-ns-quota
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-resourcequota
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: frontend
spec:
  hard:
    limits.cpu: "4"
    limits.memory: 16Gi
    requests.cpu: "4"
    requests.memory: 16Gi

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/api:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: api
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

##### FILE: deployments50_3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to frontend/ConfigMap/nginx-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  cart.html: |
    <!DOCTYPE html>
    <html>
    <body>
    <h1>You are accessing the cart page</h1>
    </body>
    </html>
  index.html: |
    <!DOCTYPE html>
    <html>
    <body>
    <h1>Hey! I am the website frontend</h1>
    </body>
    </html>
  nginx.conf: |
    user  nginx;
    worker_processes  auto;
    error_log  /var/log/nginx/error.log warn;
    pid        /var/run/nginx.pid;

    events {
      worker_connections  1024;
    }

    http {
      include       /etc/nginx/mime.types;
      default_type  application/octet-stream;
      sendfile        on;
      keepalive_timeout  65;

      server {
        listen 80;
        server_name localhost;

        location / {
          root /usr/share/nginx/html;
          index index.html;
        }

        location /cart {
          alias /usr/share/nginx/html/cart.html;
        }

        location /orders {
          alias /usr/share/nginx/html/orders.html;
        }
      }
    }
  orders.html: |
    <!DOCTYPE html>
    <html>
    <body>
    <h1>You are accessing the orders page</h1>
    </body>
    </html>
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  labels:
    component: frontend
    env: production
    project: ecommerce-platform
    version: 1.0.0
  name: nginx-config
  namespace: frontend

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
pass: 0, fail: 0, warn: 0, error: 0, skip: 0

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to api/ConfigMap/nginx-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  index.html: |
    <!DOCTYPE html>
    <html>
    <body>
    <h1>Hey I am the backend API</h1>
    </body>
    </html>
  inventory.html: |
    <!DOCTYPE html>
    <html>
    <body>
    <h1>You are accessing the inventory page</h1>
    </body>
    </html>
  nginx.conf: |
    user  nginx;
    worker_processes  auto;
    error_log  /var/log/nginx/error.log warn;
    pid        /var/run/nginx.pid;

    events {
      worker_connections  1024;
    }

    http {
      include       /etc/nginx/mime.types;
      default_type  application/octet-stream;
      sendfile        on;
      keepalive_timeout  65;

      server {
        listen 80;
        server_name localhost;

        location /api {
          alias /usr/share/nginx/html/index.html;
        }

        location /api/inventory {
          alias /usr/share/nginx/html/inventory.html;
        }
      }
    }
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  labels:
    component: frontend
    env: production
    project: ecommerce-platform
    version: 1.0.0
  name: nginx-config
  namespace: api

    env: production

    version: 1.0.0
  name: frontend-deployment
  namespace: frontend

        app: nginx
        component: frontend
        env: production
        project: ecommerce-platform
        version: 1.0.0
    spec:

      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: config-volume
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
          name: nginx-conf-volume
          subPath: nginx.conf
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: nginx-config
        name: config-volume

          items:
          - key: nginx.conf
            path: nginx.conf
          name: nginx-config

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""

  namespace: frontend

          name: kube-system
  podSelector:

##### FILE: deployments51_3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to frontend/ConfigMap/nginx-config:
apiVersion: v1
data:
  index.html: |
    <!DOCTYPE html>
    <html>
    <body>
    <h1>Hey! I am the website frontend</h1>
    </body>
    </html>
  nginx.conf: |
    user  nginx;
    worker_processes  auto;
    error_log  /var/log/nginx/error.log warn;
    pid        /var/run/nginx.pid;

    events {
      worker_connections  1024;
    }

    http {
      include       /etc/nginx/mime.types;
      default_type  application/octet-stream;
      sendfile        on;
      keepalive_timeout  65;

      server {
        listen 80;
        server_name localhost;

        location / {
          root /usr/share/nginx/html;
          index index.html;
        }
      }
    }
kind: ConfigMap
metadata:
  labels:
    app: webserver
    env: production
    project: ecommerce-platform
    version: 1.0.0
  name: nginx-config
  namespace: frontend

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to frontend/Deployment/frontend-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: webserver
    env: production
    project: ecommerce-platform
    tier: frontend
    version: 1.0.0
  name: frontend-deployment
  namespace: frontend
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: webserver
      tier: frontend
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: webserver
        tier: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: config-volume
        - mountPath: /etc/nginx/nginx.conf
          name: nginx-conf-volume
          subPath: nginx.conf
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: nginx-config
        name: config-volume
      - configMap:
          items:
          - key: nginx.conf
            path: nginx.conf
          name: nginx-config
        name: nginx-conf-volume

##### FILE: deployments53.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/backend:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: backend
  name: backend
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 10
  progressDeadlineSeconds: 600
  replicas: 2
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: backend
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 0
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: backend
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nodejs
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 3000
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 20
        name: backend
        ports:
        - containerPort: 3000
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 3000
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
        startupProbe:
          failureThreshold: 10
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 3000
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 5
          timeoutSeconds: 3
      initContainers:
      - command:
        - sh
        - -c
        - printenv
        env:
        - name: POD_NAME
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.name
        - name: POD_NAMESPACE
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: metadata.namespace
        - name: POD_IP
          valueFrom:
            fieldRef:
              fieldPath: status.podIP
        image: busybox
        name: init-container
        restartPolicy: Always

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: main
  name: netology-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 5
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: main
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: main
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.19
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
      - env:
        - name: HTTP_PORT
          value: "8080"
        - name: HTTPS_PORT
          value: "11443"
        image: wbitt/network-multitool
        name: network-multitool
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
          name: http-port
        - containerPort: 11443
          name: https-port
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 10m
            memory: 20Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 1m
            memory: 20Mi

  name: hello-world-rest-api
  namespace: default

  minReadySeconds: 45
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: hello-world-rest-api
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 25%!
(MISSING)      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: hello-world-rest-api
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: in28min/hello-world-rest-api:0.0.1.RELEASE
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: hello-world-rest-api
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            ephemeral-storage: 1Gi
            memory: 2Gi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            ephemeral-storage: 1Gi
            memory: 2Gi
        securityContext:
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - NET_RAW
        terminationMessagePath: /dev/termination-log
        terminationMessagePolicy: File
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirst
      restartPolicy: Always
      schedulerName: default-scheduler
      securityContext:
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      terminationGracePeriodSeconds: 30

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mydeployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    name: mydeployment
  name: mydeployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 5
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      name: nginx
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        name: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:latest
        name: nginxcontainer
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5000
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 128m
            memory: 500Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 20m
            memory: 55M
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane
        operator: Exists

---

##### FILE: deploymentspeedlimit.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to carina/Deployment/carina-deployment-speed-limit:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: web-server-speed-limit
  name: carina-deployment-speed-limit
  namespace: carina
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: web-server-speed-limit
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        carina.storage.io/blkio.throttle.read_bps_device: "10485760"
        carina.storage.io/blkio.throttle.read_iops_device: "10000"
        carina.storage.io/blkio.throttle.write_bps_device: "10485760"
        carina.storage.io/blkio.throttle.write_iops_device: "100000"
      labels:
        app: web-server-speed-limit
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:latest
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: web-server
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/www/html
          name: mypvc
      volumes:
      - name: mypvc
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: csi-carina-pvc-speed-limit
          readOnly: false

---

apiVersion: v1
kind: PersistentVolumeClaim
metadata:
  name: csi-carina-pvc-speed-limit
  namespace: carina

  accessModes:
  - ReadWriteOnce
  resources:
    requests:
      storage: 100Mi
  storageClassName: csi-carina-sc
  volumeMode: Filesystem

##### FILE: deployments-services.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/mysql-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: mysql-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mysql
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mysql
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_ONETIME_PASSWORD
          value: "true"
        - name: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD
              name: shinobi-secret
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: newdatabase
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          value: newuser
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_PASSWORD
              name: shinobi-secret
        image: mysql:latest
        name: mysql
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/mysql
          name: mysql-data
      volumes:
      - name: mysql-data
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: shinobi-mysql-pvc

---

##### FILE: deployments-services_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/shinobi-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: shinobi-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: shinobi
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: shinobi
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MYSQL_HOST
          value: mysql-service
        - name: MYSQL_DATABASE
          value: newdatabase
        - name: MYSQL_USER
          value: newuser
        - name: ADMIN_USER
          value: admin
        - name: MYSQL_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MYSQL_PASSWORD
              name: shinobi-secret
        - name: ADMIN_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: ADMIN_PASSWORD
              name: shinobi-secret
        - name: utcOffset
          value: ${utcOffset}
        image: registry.gitlab.com/shinobi-systems/shinobi:dev
        name: shinobi
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8080
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/localtime
          name: localtime
          readOnly: true
        - mountPath: /config
          name: config-volume
        - mountPath: /dev/shm/streamss
          name: streams-volume
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /etc/localtime
        name: localtime
      - name: config-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: shinobi-config-pvc
      - name: streams-volume
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: shinobi-streams-pvc

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

        volumeMounts:

          name: datadir

      - name: datadir

##### FILE: deploymentV24.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/app-deployment-v2:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: app-api
    version: v1
  name: app-deployment-v2
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: app-api
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: app-api
        version: v1
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MONGODB_USER
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: MONGODB_USER
              name: app-config
        - name: MONGODB_HOST
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: MONGODB_HOST
              name: app-config
        - name: MONGODB_PORT
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: MONGODB_PORT
              name: app-config
        - name: MONGODB_DB
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: MONGODB_DB
              name: app-config
        - name: MONGODB_PW
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: MONGODB_PW
              name: app-secret
        image: ghcr.io/leodom01/xm_0091-software_containerization_app:v2
        name: app-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8000
      serviceAccountName: backend-sa

---

##### FILE: deploymentWithNodePort.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/portfolio-deploy:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: portfolio-app
  name: portfolio-deploy
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: portfolio-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: portfolio-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: chilledout/personal-portfolio-web:latest
        name: portfolio-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        readinessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 0
          periodSeconds: 2
          successThreshold: 1
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 128Mi
      imagePullSecrets:
      - name: my-dockerhub-secret

---

##### FILE: deploymnet_hostpath.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 5
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.12
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data1
          name: myvolume
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /data3
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: myvolume

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

##### FILE: deploymnet_hostpath1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx
  name: nginx-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 5
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        cluster-autoscaler.kubernetes.io/safe-to-evict: "true"
      labels:
        app: nginx
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.12
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data1
          name: myvolume
      volumes:
      - hostPath:
          path: /data3
          type: DirectoryOrCreate
        name: myvolume

---

##### FILE: deployrabbitmq_3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to rabbitmqns/Deployment/podautoscaleimplemented:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: podautoscaleimplemented
  namespace: rabbitmqns
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: podautoscaleimplemented
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: podautoscaleimplemented
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: INTERVAL
          value: "30"
        - name: RABBIT_HOST
          value: http://10.244.1.102
        - name: RABBIT_USER
          value: user
        - name: RABBIT_PASS
          value: PASSWORD@123
        - name: AUTOSCALING
          value: |
            1|5|5|rabbitmqns|php-apache|newvalue-queue;
        - name: LOGS
          value: HIGH
        - name: SLACK_HOOK
          value: ""
        image: dockerdotvinayak/kalaspuffarabbitmq-hpa
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: podautoscaleimplemented
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 50Mi
      serviceAccountName: podautoscaleimplemented
      tolerations:
      - effect: NoSchedule
        key: node-role.kubernetes.io/master

---

##### FILE: deploys_2.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/frontend-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: frontend-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: frontend
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 1
      maxUnavailable: 1
    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: frontend
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: ghcr.io/benedict-cs/k8s-hw3-frontend:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 20
          periodSeconds: 5
        name: frontend
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/db-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: db-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: db
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: db
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: mongo:latest
        livenessProbe:
          initialDelaySeconds: 15
          periodSeconds: 10
          tcpSocket:
            port: 27017
        name: db
        ports:
        - containerPort: 27017
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /data/db
          name: mongo-storage
      volumes:
      - name: mongo-storage
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: mongo-pvc

---

##### FILE: deploywithnodeaffinity.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/red:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: red
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      run: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        run: nginx
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane
                operator: Exists
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: nginx

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.
skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/red

skipped mutate policy add-safe-to-evict -> resource default/Deployment/red
policy disallow-default-namespace -> resource default/Deployment/red failed:
1 - validate-podcontroller-namespace validation error: Using 'default' namespace is not allowed for pod controllers. rule validate-podcontroller-namespace failed at path /metadata/namespace/

##### FILE: deploywithnodeaffinity1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/red:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: red
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      run: nginx
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        run: nginx
    spec:
      affinity:
        nodeAffinity:
          requiredDuringSchedulingIgnoredDuringExecution:
            nodeSelectorTerms:
            - matchExpressions:
              - key: node-role.kubernetes.io/control-plane
                operator: Exists
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        imagePullPolicy: Always
        name: nginx

---

##### FILE: deply.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/darwin-app:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: darwin-app
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: darwin-app
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: darwin-app
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:latest
        livenessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /darwin-probes
            port: 443
            scheme: HTTPS
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: darwin-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 443
        readinessProbe:
          httpGet:
            path: /darwin-probes
            port: 443
            scheme: HTTPS
          initialDelaySeconds: 5
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 5

---

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/myapp-deployment:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: myapp-deployment
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: myapp
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: myapp
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: PLAYER_INITIAL_LIVES
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: player_initial_lives
              name: game-demo
        image: myapp
        name: myapp-container
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /etc/secret
          name: secret-volume
      volumes:
      - name: secret-volume
        secret:
          secretName: db-credentials

---

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: recreate-deploy
  namespace: manjulika
spec:
  replicas: 4
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      aap: nginx
  strategy:
    type: ReCreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        aap: nginx
      name: nginx-pod
      namespace: manjulika
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:latest
        name: nginx-container
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80

##### FILE: depolyment-with-label.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/hello-world-rest-api-v1:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: hello-world-rest-api
    version: v1
  name: hello-world-rest-api-v1
  namespace: default
spec:
  minReadySeconds: 45
  replicas: 1
  revisionHistoryLimit: 10
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: hello-world-rest-api
      version: v1
  strategy:
    rollingUpdate:
      maxSurge: 25%!
(MISSING)      maxUnavailable: 25%!
(MISSING)    type: RollingUpdate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: hello-world-rest-api
        version: v1
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: in28min/hello-world-rest-api:0.0.1.RELEASE
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: hello-world-rest-api
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 500m
            ephemeral-storage: 1Gi

          capabilities:

            - NET_RAW

      restartPolicy: Always
