##### FILE: desafio1_nginx_statefulset.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/StatefulSet/giropops-set:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: giropops-set
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 3
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: giropops-set
  serviceName: giropops-set
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: giropops-set
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /usr/share/nginx/html
          name: nginx-persistent-storage
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: nginx-persistent-storage
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi

##### FILE: desafio-codcerto1.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-girus:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx-girus
    opa: sensacional-juvenal
  name: nginx-girus
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 2
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-girus
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-girus
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.16.0
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /
            port: 80
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        name: nginx
        readinessProbe:
          exec:
            command:
            - curl
            - -f
            - http://localhost:80/
          failureThreshold: 3
          initialDelaySeconds: 10
          periodSeconds: 10
          successThreshold: 1
          timeoutSeconds: 5
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.7"
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 64Mi

---


Mutation:
Mutation has been applied successfully.

##### FILE: desafio-day-3.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/nginx-girus:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: nginx-girus
    opa: sensacional-juvenal
  name: nginx-girus
  namespace: default

  replicas: 5
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: nginx-girus
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: nginx-girus
    spec:
      containers:
      - image: nginx:1.16.0
        name: nginx

            cpu: 700m
            memory: 128Mi
          requests:
            cpu: 500m
            memory: 64Mi

1 - autogen-require-drop-all validation failure: Containers must drop `ALL` capabilities.

        app: nginx

      containers:
      - image: nginx
        name: nginx
        ports:
        - containerPort: 80
          name: http

          name: nginx-data
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: nginx-data
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi

##### FILE: descheduler11.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to kube-system/Deployment/descheduler:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  labels:
    app: descheduler
  name: descheduler
  namespace: kube-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: descheduler
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: descheduler
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - --policy-config-file
        - /policy-dir/policy.yaml
        - --descheduling-interval
        - 5m
        - --v
        - "3"
        command:
        - /bin/descheduler
        image: registry.k8s.io/descheduler/descheduler:v0.31.0
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        livenessProbe:
          failureThreshold: 3
          httpGet:
            path: /healthz
            port: 10258
            scheme: HTTPS
          initialDelaySeconds: 3
          periodSeconds: 10
        name: descheduler
        ports:
        - containerPort: 10258
          protocol: TCP
        resources:
          requests:
            cpu: 100m
            memory: 256Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          privileged: false
          readOnlyRootFilesystem: true
          runAsNonRoot: true
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /policy-dir
          name: policy-volume
      priorityClassName: system-cluster-critical
      serviceAccountName: descheduler-sa
      volumes:
      - configMap:
          name: descheduler-policy-configmap
        name: policy-volume

---

##### FILE: desired_validating_webhook.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/ValidatingWebhookConfiguration/externalsecret-validate:
apiVersion: admissionregistration.k8s.io/v1
kind: ValidatingWebhookConfiguration
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/instance: external-secrets
    external-secrets.io/component: webhook
  name: externalsecret-validate
  namespace: default
webhooks:
- admissionReviewVersions:
  - v1
  - v1beta1
  clientConfig:
    caBundle: Cg==
    service:
      name: external-secrets-webhook
      namespace: external-secrets
      path: /validate-external-secrets-io-v1beta1-externalsecret
  name: validate.externalsecret.external-secrets.io
  rules:
  - apiGroups:
    - external-secrets.io
    apiVersions:
    - v1beta1
    operations:
    - CREATE
    - UPDATE
    - DELETE
    resources:
    - externalsecrets
    scope: Namespaced
  sideEffects: None
  timeoutSeconds: 5

---

    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: generate-limitrange
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: default-limitrange
  namespace: wp-ivan
spec:
  limits:
  - default:
      cpu: 500m
      memory: 1Gi
    defaultRequest:
      cpu: 200m
      memory: 256Mi
    type: Container

---

Generation completed successfully.

apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment

  namespace: wp-ivan
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: wp
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: wp
      name: wp-pod-template
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: WORDPRESS_DB_HOST
          value: mariadb-service:3307
        - name: WORDPRESS_DB_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: user
              name: datos-secretos-bbdd
        - name: WORDPRESS_DB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: datos-secretos-bbdd

          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: nombre
              name: datos-bbdd
        image: wordpress:6.4
        name: wp
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/www/html
          name: datos-persistentes
      nodeSelector:
        nodo: ivan
      volumes:
      - name: datos-persistentes
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: pvc-wp

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to wp-ivan/StatefulSet/mariadb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: StatefulSet
metadata:
  name: mariadb
  namespace: wp-ivan
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      app: mariadb
  serviceName: mariadb-service
  template:
    metadata:
      labels:
        app: mariadb
      name: mariadb-pod-template
    spec:
      containers:
      - env:
        - name: MARIADB_ROOT_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: root-password
              name: datos-secretos-bbdd
        - name: MARIADB_USER
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: user
              name: datos-secretos-bbdd
        - name: MARIADB_PASSWORD
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: password
              name: datos-secretos-bbdd
        - name: MARIADB_DATABASE
          valueFrom:
            configMapKeyRef:
              key: nombre
              name: datos-bbdd
        image: mariadb:11.2
        name: mariadb
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /var/lib/mysql
          name: pvc-mariadb
      nodeSelector:
        nodo: ivan
  volumeClaimTemplates:
  - metadata:
      name: pvc-mariadb
    spec:
      accessModes:
      - ReadWriteOnce
      resources:
        requests:
          storage: 1Gi

policy add-networkpolicy-dns applied to default/Namespace/wp-ivan:
apiVersion: networking.k8s.io/v1
kind: NetworkPolicy
metadata:
  labels:
    app.kubernetes.io/managed-by: kyverno
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-name: add-networkpolicy-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/policy-namespace: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/rule-name: add-netpol-dns
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-namespace: default
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-version: v1
  name: allow-dns
  namespace: wp-ivan
spec:
  egress:
  - ports:
    - port: 53
      protocol: UDP
    to:
    - namespaceSelector:
        matchLabels:
          name: kube-system
  podSelector:
    matchLabels: {}
  policyTypes:
  - Egress

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-group: ""
    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-kind: Namespace

    generate.kyverno.io/trigger-uid: ""

  name: default-resourcequota
  namespace: wp-ivan
spec:

    limits.cpu: "4"

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to dev-holos/Job/holos-init:
apiVersion: batch/v1
kind: Job
metadata:
  annotations:
    helm.sh/hook: pre-install,pre-upgrade
    helm.sh/hook-delete-policy: before-hook-creation
    helm.sh/hook-weight: "2"
  name: holos-init
  namespace: dev-holos
spec:
  activeDeadlineSeconds: 300
  backoffLimit: 5
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - command:
        - /app/bin/holos
        - server
        - init
        - --log-level=debug
        - --log-format=json
        env:
        - name: DATABASE_URL
          valueFrom:
            secretKeyRef:
              key: uri
              name: holos-app
        image: quay.io/holos-run/holos:v0.87.2-26-g3845174
        imagePullPolicy: IfNotPresent
        name: holos
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 512Mi
          requests:
            cpu: "0.5"
            memory: 512Mi
        securityContext:
          allowPrivilegeEscalation: false
          capabilities:
            drop:
            - ALL
          runAsNonRoot: true
      restartPolicy: OnFailure
      securityContext:
        seccompProfile:
          type: RuntimeDefault
      serviceAccountName: holos

---

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/dev-pb:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    kompose.cmd: kompose convert
    kompose.version: 1.22.0 (955b78124)
    traefik.enable: "true"
    traefik.http.routers.dev-pb.entrypoints: websecure
    traefik.http.routers.dev-pb.middlewares: security-headers@file, error-pages-middleware@docker,
      ratelimit@file, geoblock@file
    traefik.http.routers.dev-pb.rule: Host(`dev.`) && (PathPrefix(`/_`) || PathPrefix(`/api`))
    traefik.http.routers.dev-pb.tls.certresolver: leresolver
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: dev-pb
  name: dev-pb
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: dev-pb
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kompose.cmd: kompose convert
        kompose.version: 1.22.0 (955b78124)
        traefik.enable: "true"
        traefik.http.routers.dev-pb.entrypoints: websecure
        traefik.http.routers.dev-pb.middlewares: security-headers@file, error-pages-middleware@docker,
          ratelimit@file, geoblock@file
        traefik.http.routers.dev-pb.rule: Host(`dev.`) && (PathPrefix(`/_`) || PathPrefix(`/api`))
        traefik.http.routers.dev-pb.tls.certresolver: leresolver
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        io.kompose.network/net: "true"
        io.kompose.service: dev-pb
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - modd
        command:
        - /pb/entrypoint.sh
        env:
        - name: AUDITLOG
          value: posts,users
        - name: HOME
          value: /pb
        image: golang:alpine
        name: dev-pb
        ports:
        - containerPort: 8090
        resources: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /pb
          name: dev-pb-claim0
          subPath: pb
        - mountPath: /sk
          name: dev-pb-claim0
          subPath: sk
        - mountPath: /go/pkg
          name: dev-pb-claim0
          subPath: go/pkg
        workingDir: /pb
      restartPolicy: Always
      volumes:
      - name: dev-pb-claim0
        persistentVolumeClaim:
          claimName: dev-pb-claim0
status: {}

---

kind: PersistentVolume

  name: dev-pb-pv

  - ReadWriteOnce

      nodeSelectorTerms:
      - matchExpressions:
        - key: kubernetes.io/hostname
          operator: In
          values:
          - vmi1686791.contaboserver.net
  persistentVolumeReclaimPolicy: Retain
  storageClassName: local-storage
  volumeMode: Filesystem

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to sales-system/Deployment/sales:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  name: sales
  namespace: sales-system
spec:
  replicas: 1
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    spec:
      containers:
      - name: sales-api
        resources:
          limits:
            cpu: 250m
          requests:
            cpu: 250m
      dnsPolicy: ClusterFirstWithHostNet
      hostNetwork: true

##### FILE: dev-sk-deployment.yaml #####

Applying 61 policy rule(s) to 1 resource(s)...

policy add-safe-to-evict applied to default/Deployment/dev-sk:
apiVersion: apps/v1
kind: Deployment
metadata:
  annotations:
    kompose.cmd: kompose convert
    kompose.version: 1.22.0 (955b78124)
    traefik.enable: "true"
    traefik.http.routers.dev-sk.entrypoints: websecure
    traefik.http.routers.dev-sk.middlewares: security-headers@file, error-pages-middleware@docker,
      ratelimit@file, geoblock@file
    traefik.http.routers.dev-sk.rule: Host(`dev.`) && !PathPrefix(`/api`) && !PathPrefix(`/_`)
    traefik.http.routers.dev-sk.tls.certresolver: leresolver
  creationTimestamp: null
  labels:
    io.kompose.service: dev-sk
  name: dev-sk
  namespace: default
spec:
  replicas: 1
  selector:
    matchLabels:
      io.kompose.service: dev-sk
  strategy:
    type: Recreate
  template:
    metadata:
      annotations:
        kompose.cmd: kompose convert
        kompose.version: 1.22.0 (955b78124)
        traefik.enable: "true"
        traefik.http.routers.dev-sk.entrypoints: websecure
        traefik.http.routers.dev-sk.middlewares: security-headers@file, error-pages-middleware@docker,
          ratelimit@file, geoblock@file
        traefik.http.routers.dev-sk.rule: Host(`dev.`) && !PathPrefix(`/api`) && !PathPrefix(`/_`)
        traefik.http.routers.dev-sk.tls.certresolver: leresolver
      creationTimestamp: null
      labels:
        io.kompose.network/net: "true"
        io.kompose.service: dev-sk
    spec:
      containers:
      - args:
        - sh
        - -c
        - npx pnpm install && npm run dev -- --host 0.0.0.0
        env:
        - name: HOME
          value: /sk
        image: node:current-alpine
        name: dev-sk
        ports:
        - containerPort: 5173
        resources: {}
        volumeMounts:
        - mountPath: /sk
          name: dev-pb-claim0
          subPath: sk/sk
        - mountPath: /pb
          name: dev-pb-claim0
          subPath: pb
